name: CALM MOSS
description:
Relax in a mossy circle surrounded by rolling hills. Turn on the radio and watch birds fly by. Sit down and enjoy some poetry.

Change your latitude or longitude in the gameplay options menu to affect the positioning of the heavens.

Standard FPP controls. F/Left Face Button to interact.

Inspired by the cartridge Moss by Paul McCann. Using music by One Man Symphony.

If you want a markedly less relaxed experience, try my other AGBIC jam entry, THIS MAZE HATES YOU.
